patthana15.79:4.1: Saraṇaṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.79:5.1: Araṇaṃ apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naapacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.79:6.1: Araṇaṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
